website_summaries.verdict: This air purifier has an appealing modern design, operates quietly, and functions well.
pros: Stylish outer shell looks more like an essential oil diffuser
Contains a diffusing tray for aromatherapy
Easily portable and effective up to 50 sq
ft. Quiet, soothing operation with variable fan speeds
cons: Oil diffuser feature is not as impressive as air purifier
Does not perform well in dustier rooms

customer_reviews.title: Good air purifier for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this air purifier for a few months now in our bedroom. The filter is absolutely filthy now so I know it’s been working. Our dogs sleep in our room and it never smells. I do believe it works well. As for the noise, it isn’t silent but yet it isn’t loud either. I do notice if I forget to turn it on when I lay down because I’ve gotten used to the hum.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fronczak

customer_reviews.title: Filters are crazy expense
customer_reviews.text: It's not worth it. It's very small, smaller then I was thinking. It's very hard to find filters and then they are crazy expense for the size of the machine. $26.00 for a filter of this size is way to much.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hermann

customer_reviews.title: Machine is broken after only 1 months of using.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my air purifier for the last month and it’s starting to sounds like something is broken I’m it. It’s very loud. I had to turn it off, I was afraid to leave it plugged in- in the nursery. Also, trying to find replacement filters it’s a a hassle. I can’t find them here on amazon, which if the product is sold on this site so should the filter. Now, we have to buy a new one and it won’t be this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: SerenLife Air purifier is working great after 1 week of usage. Feeling freshness in air and it runs from morning around 7 am till 10 pm at night.. we have kept the air purifier in our Drawing room and it covers most of the connect rooms. Happy with the product till now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sujoy Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality and terrific customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My air purifier arrived within less than a week of ordering it. The product is small enough to transport around the house, and it makes a very nice quiet soothing sound. Easy to work, with only three buttons. Keeps the house smelling so clean and fresh. Love our new air purifier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Totally love my air purifier I have one in the living ...
customer_reviews.text: I Totally love my air purifier I have one in the living area and one in my bedroom and the fact that i live in an area where the train kicks off dust off the tracks and i live by the elevated train it keeps the dust to a minimum...GREAT PRODUCT !!! I also love the fact that i can use the oils i love for aroma therapy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SereneLife Air Purifier is great. I have it beside my desk & it ...
customer_reviews.text: SereneLife Air Purifier is great. I have it beside my desk & it works wonderful. It is exactly what I wanted. Very speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Filters are too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the purifier itself! But the filters are too expensive!
customer_reviews.author: jamilyn marinaccio

customer_reviews.title: SereneLife Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: Received my air purifier and am excited with how well it works. I plan to purchase another one in the near future to place in another room. This one is in my living/dining area and will stay there. Again, very pleased with my SereneLife Air Purifier, model #PSLAPU20.
customer_reviews.author: Meggan E. Guidry

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I bought this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this product. The air in my room is so much better. I used have a lot of dust, and now I can barely see any on my furniture. I am only giving it 4 stars because the light really bothers me. I am the kind of person that needs complete darkness when I sleep, and this product could be much better if there was no light. Or if the light could be turned off. I am really in love with the essential oil dispenser. My room smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great and came packaged perfectly and on time with directions and ready to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's what I would except. ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's what I would except. I had hoped the essential oil diffuser would be more potent but no complaints otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren See

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my products and with how quickly they arrived!!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: cathy hutton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not the perfect, but it seems to do its job for the price. It definitely helps with my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from migraines and thought this would be a good idea to try for my bedroom to keep the air clean. I had no idea how much dust was in the air until the changed the filter recently! Makes a big difference in the air quality and my night headaches are disappearing. Thanks for a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R. Currier

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it one night, but I woke up with a clear nose and eyes that didn't itch from allergies. The unit is small, nicely designed, and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dust out of the electronics
customer_reviews.text: This is quiet and does it's job. We use it around our entertainment center to help keep the electronics from getting so dusty and overheating. It works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but don't expect a strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Pros- great price, whisper quiet, easy to assemble, truly has reduced my allergies (I normally wake up with a stuffy nose EVERY day), filter lasts a long time/180 days Cons- I only have one. The aroma part is very weak. I bought high quality oils, so its not the oils. You put the oil on a tiny piece of sponge, so maybe thats why. I had a water based purifier before and you could smell it for hours. With this one you can smell it if you stand right next to the purifier, for a few minutes. Thats it.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Filters filters filters.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Trouble is that the filters are hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Purifies but does not diffuse!
customer_reviews.text: I like this - helps out a lot ! However the diffuser is not that good.
customer_reviews.author: ZeroFox

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's great with the oils as well.
customer_reviews.author: RondoBaybee

customer_reviews.title: I personally like a little white noise
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute air purifier. I just adopted a cat and my boyfriend has allergies, so I wanted something that could purify the air in my apartment without breaking the bank. It gets the job done - I've had it for a month now and when I open it to look at the filter I can see that it's collecting junk (including some cat hair!). It's a little noisy on the higher settings, but quiet enough to ignore on the lowest. I personally like a little white noise. I haven't used any scented oils yet, so I can't attest to anything there.
customer_reviews.author: michelle rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Can't find the replacement filters anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it when I used it. If you put it on the rug, watch out the dust marks. Smells great and love that it incorporates a HEPA filter. Can't use it now because the replacement filters are nowhere to be found!
customer_reviews.author: LoveAll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this last night and I noticed a difference in the air quality right away!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Church

product_meta.title: Updated Premium SereneLife Air Purifier Hepa Filter, Hepa Air Purifier, Air Cleaner Purifier, Removes Dust, Aroma Diffuser Oil Tray, Ventilation Fan, 50 Sq. Ft. Coverage (PSLAPU20)
product_meta.description:
The SereneLife Air Purifier effectively improves indoor environment air quality, fresh air with hassle-free operation. Simple operation allows you to just plug it in and the integrated HEPA filter works to capture unwanted dust. It also features a built-in aroma oil diffuser tray giving you the ability to add therapeutic oils and fragrances. The ventilation fan allows for extended air flow and the front panel touch button panel allows you to control air circulation fan speeds. The lightweight and compact size fit on any countertop or table -- making it perfect for the home or office. Enjoy reliable and convenient dual layer air-filtering technology with the SereneLife Air Purifier.

Features:

  • Improves Indoor Environment Air Quality
  • Simple & Hassle-Free Operation: Just Plug it In
  • Breathe Healthier with Fresh Air
  • Built-in HEPA Filter
  • Dual Layer Air-Purification: Includes Additional Carbon Filter
  • Aroma Oil Diffuser Tray: Ability to Add Therapeutic Oils/Fragrances
  • Captures Dust Particles
  • Ventilation Fan for Extended Air Flow
  • Safe for Use Around Children & Pets
  • Speed Adjustable Circulation Air Fan
  • Perfect for the Home or Office
  • Front Panel Touch Button Control
  • Lightweight & Compact Size
  • LED Indicator Lights
  • Includes Wall Power Adapter

    Technical Specs:

  • Rated Air-Flow Volume: 24 Cubic Meters/Hour
  • Coverage Area: Up to 50'+ Square Feet
  • Suggested Filter Replacement Time: 180 Days
  • Air Purification Efficiency: >90%
  • Noise Level: <52dB
  • Power: 110-240V, AC
  • Dimensions (L x W x H): 7.3'' x 7.6'' x 9.9''
  • Sold as: 1
  • Weight: 3.58 lbs.
feature_bullets: DUAL LAYER PROTECTION: The SereneLife air purifier offers dual layer shield in the form of a built-in HEPA filter, as well as an additional carbon filter.
REMOVES DUST: Make dusting a thing of the past. The best air purifier makes it easy to capture dust particles without vigorous cleaning.
SIMPLE OPERATION: Simply plug in the small air purifier to reap the benefits. Ultra-quiet operation & speed adjustable air circulation makes this HEPA air purifier the best.
EFFECTIVE ROOM COVERAGE: The air cleaner purifier provides powerful coverage from any room up to 50' square feet. Perfect for the home or office. The ventilation fan allows for extended air flow.
AROMA OIL DIFFUSER: The air purifier filter system gives you the ability to add therapeutic oils and fragrances. Added bonus it is safe for use around children and pets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars39 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
